detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ChiToken._destroyChildren(uint256) (ChiToken.sol#879-891):
	External calls:
	- computeAddress2(_totalBurned + i).call() (ChiToken.sol#885)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBurned = _totalBurned + value (ChiToken.sol#889)
	ChiToken.totalBurned (ChiToken.sol#783) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ChiToken._destroyChildren(uint256) (ChiToken.sol#879-891)
	- ChiToken.totalBurned (ChiToken.sol#783)
	- ChiToken.totalSupply() (ChiToken.sol#787-791)
